rules_text: Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, surveil 1. This ability only triggers once each turn. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
rules_text2: Create two 1/1 blue Bird creature tokens, then Feathered Following deals damage equal to the number of creatures you control with flying to a creature you don't control.
